title: On Twitter, Who Needs a Check Mark When You Can Have a Rat?
description: Elon Musk wants Twitter users to pay to be verified. An artist offers a wry alternative.

title: Confusion and Frustration Reign as Elon Musk Cuts Half of Twitter’s Staff
description: The layoffs hit across many divisions, including the engineering and machine learning units, the teams that manage content moderation, and the sales and advertising departments.

title: Twitter’s Advertisers Pull Back as Layoffs Sweep Through Company
description: Elon Musk, Twitter’s new owner, acknowledged that ad spending on the platform had slumped. He blamed the drop on pressure from activists.

title: On Social Media, Hunting for Voter Fraud Becomes a Game
description: Players who post about irregularities are awarded points or titles, leading participants to question the legitimacy of elections.

title: Is This A.I. Thanksgiving Menu Better Than a Human’s?
description: Researchers are using artificial intelligence to create recipes, complete with appetizing photos and back stories. But Thanksgiving poses a challenge.

title: Meet the Woman Planning an Underwater Highline
description: Part public housing for fish, part carbon-capture project, part art installation, Ximena Caminos’s project for Miami Beach, known as the ReefLine, aims to call attention to the challenges facing the city’s marine life.

title: Twitter Employees on Life Under Elon Musk
description: A radical shake-up is underway at the social media company.

title: Worries Grow That TikTok Is New Home for Manipulated Video and Photos
description: Misleading edits, fake news stories and deepfake images of politicians are starting to warp reality on the popular video platform.

title: Elon Musk Begins Layoffs at Twitter
description: The social media company’s 7,500 employees have been bracing for job cuts since Mr. Musk took it over last week.
